title: Commerzbank CFO Engels to step down in 2020 to join Danske - Nasdaq.com
text: FRANKFURT, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Commerzbank's  Chief Financial Officer Stephan Engels is stepping down next year, Germany's second-largest listed lender said on Thursday.
Engels, CFO since 2012, has told Commerzbank that he would decline a potential offer to extend his contract running until April 2020.
Engels has accepted a job as Chief Financial Officer at Danske Bank , the Danish lender said separately.
